TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheEntryRemovedReason extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the reason why a cache entry was removed or an entry is about to be removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedReason> enumeration is used to provide a predefined set of reasons why a cache entry was removed or is about to be removed. The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedArguments> class takes a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedReason> value as one of the parameter to pass to a callback method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedReason CacheSpecificEviction = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A cache entry was evicted for as reason that is defined by a particular cache implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedReason ChangeMonitorChanged = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A cache entry was removed because a related dependency (such as a file or another cache entry) triggered eviction of the cache entry.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedReason Evicted = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A cache entry was removed to free memory in the cache. This occurs when a cache instance approaches cache-specific memory limits, or when a process or cache instance approaches computer-wide memory limits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedReason Expired = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A cache entry was removed because it expired. Expiration can be based on an absolute time or on a sliding expiration time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedReason Removed = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A cache entry was removed by using the or method.
